quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.

quotes.quote: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.

quotes.quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not so sure.

quotes.quote: I'm on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.

quotes.quote: I don't mean to interrupt people. I just randomly remember things and get really excited.

quotes.quote: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I was supposed to do.

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.

quotes.quote: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.

quotes.quote: I'm not clumsy. It's just the floor hates me, the tables and chairs are bullies, and the walls get in my way.

quotes.quote: I'm not a control freak. Now, can you please move? You're standing too close to the line I drew.

quotes.quote: My favorite exercise is a cross between a lunge and a crunch. It's called lunch.

quotes.quote: I don't suffer from insanity. I enjoy every minute of it.

quotes.quote: I have a hobby. I have the world's largest collection of sea shells. I keep it scattered on beaches all over the world. Maybe you've seen it.

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm just very relaxed.

quotes.quote: I'm not procrastinating. I'm just prioritizing my immediate happiness.

quotes.quote: I am so good at sleeping I can do it with my eyes closed.

quotes.quote: My brain is 90% song lyrics, 8% worry, and 2% remembering to put the laundry in the dryer.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I have a GPS in my car. It keeps telling me to 'proceed to the route.' I'm already on the route! What does it want from me?!

quotes.quote: My social security number is 1. Because I'm the first person you should call.
